sources.title: Love Glory
sources.description: Kunstner:  Peter Asschenfeldt & the Colonels Releasedato:  26/04/2016 Genre:  Pop Format:  Download who need to have broken heart? who need to fall a part? who knows what we're living for? why do we fall in love? will be other understand? will we ever take the chance? will we ever try, to trust the love again? Love and Glory are for lover and lonely love and Glory eternity! Don't you know the same of story? That of this Humanity eternity god is on our side who need to have broken heart who need to fall a part who knows what we're living for why do we fall in luv will we ever understand will we ever take the chances will we ever try to trust A love Again Love & Glory fr a love and lonely

metadata.Plot: A failed pilot about a rich Virginia plantation owner and his family caught up in the American Civil War. He has a slave for a mistress, his older son is to marry a working class Irish girl and his younger son promotes the Confede...
metadata.Actors: Daniel Markel, Tracy Griffith, Zach Galligan
